product_name: Dragon APXS Nike Edition Snow Goggles
long_description: With a rimless design, oversized interchangeable lenses and a cool, collaborative design with Nike, the Dragon APXS Nike Edition snow goggles fit medium faces and maximize your peripheral vision. Each frame option comes with interchangeable lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions from cloudy to sunny. Nike Splatter frame has a Gold Ionized lens (yellow tint, 20-25% visible light transmission (VLT)) and a spare Yellow-Blue Ionized lens (yellow tint, 45-55% VLT). Nike Anthracite frame has a Red Ionized lens (bronze tint, 20-25% VLT) and a spare Yellow-Blue Ionized lens (yellow tint, 45-55% VLT). Interchangeable lens design makes it easy to swap lenses to meet the conditions-simply pop the existing lens off of the frame and snap in the replacement lens. Oversized spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for an extra-wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Double-layer lens creates a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and the warm air around your face, helping reduce fogging. Anti-fog coating on inner lens and vents in both the frame and lens further combat fogging; scratch-resistant coating protects the outer lens from getting marred. Rimless frame helps maxmize your peripheral vision; resilient polyurethane frame material stays flexible in all temperatures, ensuring your comfort when the mercury drops. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. The helmet-compatible Dragon APXS Nike Edition snow goggles are designed to fit medium-size faces.
short_description: With a rimless design, oversized interchangeable lenses and a cool, collaborative design with Nike, the Dragon APXS Nike Edition snow goggles fit medium faces and maximize your peripheral vision.
